features.featureTitle: Build a Welcome / Home screen that displays the APNI DUKAAN logo (from frontend/public/assets/generated/apni-dukaan-logo.png) prominently, the tagline 'Har Dukan Online', and two large call-to-action buttons: 'Find a Shop' (customer flow) and 'Register Your Shop' (seller flow). The screen must be mobile-first and full-viewport.

Build a Shop Listings page for the customer flow. It must fetch all shops from the backend and display them as cards showing shop name, category, city, and phone number. Include a search bar to filter by shop name or city, and a category filter dropdown. Each card must be tappable and navigate to the shop detail page.

Build a Shop Detail page that displays the full profile of a single shop: shop name, owner name, category, description, address, city, phone number (tappable tel: link), WhatsApp number (tappable wa.me link), opening hours, and shop image. Include a back button to return to the listings page.

Build a multi-step Seller Registration form (minimum 3 steps) for shop owners to create their digital shop profile. Step 1: Basic Info (owner name, shop name, category selection). Step 2: Location & Contact (address, city, phone number, WhatsApp number, opening hours). Step 3: Description & Review (shop description, review all entered details). On final submission, call the backend registerShop() function and show a success confirmation screen with the generated shop ID.

Apply a consistent visual theme across the entire app derived from the APNI DUKAAN logo: primary green (#2EBD59 range) and primary blue (#1A56B0 range) color palette, clean white backgrounds, bold sans-serif typography, rounded card components, and a mobile-first layout with a sticky bottom navigation or header showing the logo on inner pages.
